title: Chapter 02.06.2018 — The Tease
summary: A brisk wind, the smell of first rain, and a Chennai evening that promised everything but delivered nothing.

title: Chapter 23.09.17 — TADA
summary: A first trek with friends — monkeys, empty fuel tanks, a stubborn RE Classic, and one very friendly dog.

title: Chapter 23.07.17 — The Last Day
summary: The last day at a company — stuck doors, bag checks, and the sweet relief of walking out for the last time.
